member.summary: Helper class for registering event log source name to Windows event log.

member.summary: User-friendly name of event log source.

member.summary: Creates event log registration of application in registry.
member.param: Event source name (backslash "\" in source name is not allowed).

member.summary: Removes event log registration of application from registry.
member.param: Event source name (backslash "\" in source name is not allowed).

member.summary: Checks if event log source name is registered.

member.summary: Setups default event log trace listener.
